ygData.subject: Re: The Man (?) Behind the Curtain
ygData.msgSnippet: Since we re revealing ourselves ;) I m a 26-year-old male.  I play in an international live-action fantasy roleplaying club, where I play... Yep - a Bard.
ygData.messageBody:
Since we're "revealing" ourselves ;)
I'm a 26-year-old male. I play in an international live-action fantasy
roleplaying club, where I play... Yep - a Bard.
Like my character, I'm a jack of all trades - playing a variety of
instruments (though none of them incredibly well) as well as working
several different jobs.
I love to do web design and roleplay, and have numerous pages dedicated to in.

Although I am Talies the Wanderer on Bristlebane, and Talies Wanderbur in
DragonRealms, I am usually known as

Snicker Furfoot, Esq. | Live the Dream
Keeper of the Atlas | http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/atlas/
Dust Dancer | Dance the Dance
Check out the Bard's Guild at http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/
* * * Coming Soon: Heraldry: Amtgard Style! * * *

"Never piss off a bard, for they are not subtle, and your name scans to
Greensleeves."
